direction.raw_text: !!... (she slaps Johnnie hard across the face) There I slap that mutha fucka face - pay attention fucka - otherwise we hafta work it all night...  Too much fun for us - you see what I mean?  Now watch me how I touch a bottle and you count how many times. Juana steps two paces across the hut where two dirty old soda bottles sit - one in one corner perched on a dried tree trunk - the other in the opposite corner perched on an old fence post.  Juana touches the left bottle (#1) once, and crosses and touches the right bottle (#2) once and comes back and touches Johnnies face.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You see, Johnnie.  I toucha number one bottle once, I toucha number two bottle once, and I touch your face. This is a game we love to play.  I get hot already...  Now you meet second Mr. Killer...  Does he fish or dont he? Reggie and Drop Shadow step out of the darkness behind Johnnie and come around to face him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey, Johnnie...  Reggie - you remember Reggie, dont ya?  Look what I caught. (to Juana) Im gettin hot too, mama. Reggie and Juana kiss hot in front of Johnnie.  Juana puts her face down in front of Johnnies again.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Now Johnnie...  We want to feel the feelin...  Feel the feelin...  We be gettin up close to you, mutha fucka, then we go out away ... no mally we touch two bottles - both bottle bfore comin back and touchin you...  This mean you okay fo awhile...  If we go out away, and we touch ONLY ONE BOTTLE bfore comin back and touchin you - you gonna hear a click from a gun bhind you and then its gonna be bout ten seconds...  Remember that number ten - then thats when the end come... What end I talk bout Johnnie? - I talk about THE END, FUCKA-  That head will go every parta this room... I talk bout NO MO JOHNNIE...  I think you understand now - we play game.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I cant stop her, Johnnie...  She gets me too hot doin this...  Im gonna be right here, but Im gonna stand right behind ya with this big ol gun here... Reggie reaches his hand around in front of Johnnie - showing him a .45 Automatic.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thats a Marine issue.  It goes off somethin terrible - you wanna see? Drop Shadow pulls the hammer back which makes a loud click.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You hear click? Johnnie jumps as Drop Shadow blows a big hole in the far wall in front of Johnnie.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hell, its even worse than I remember...  Wait a minute... Reggie comes out in front of Johnnie - Juana grabs him.  They kiss hot again.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay, gimmee nother kiss, Reggie bfore I fuck ya right now...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . (she opens her mouth with her tongue sticking out)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! Juana screams like a monster from hell coming up close to Johnnies face.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You think you gonna live through this night?...  YOU WRONG...  I SMELL YO SHIT NOW, JOHNNIE.  GIVE US ONE MO KISS, REGGIE.  OH FUCK ME!!!  WE TOUCH BOTTLES NOW - FO WE CANT WAIT NO MO. Reggie goes back behind Johnnie quick.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I go out now...  I toucha one bottle... Reggie...  I toucha two bottle... I come back, I touch Johnnie...  AHHHHH ...  I touch myself... (she puts her hand between her legs)
direction.name: direction

result.heading: I SMELL YO SHIT NOW, JOHNNIE
GIVE US ONE MO KISS, REGGIE
FO WE CANT WAIT NO MO

direction.raw_text: !...  Now I go out - I toucha one bottle...  Do I touch second bottle?... I go now and touch...  OH OH...  Okay... This time I toucha second bottle...  I go back, I touch Johnnie...  Then I go back - I kiss Reggie with big gun... Oh God, Reggie done got two big guns...
direction.name: direction

result.heading: SO FUCKIN HOT NOW, MAYBE TOO FUCKIN HOT NOW, FUCKA
DO I GO TOUCH A SECOND BOTTLE
I DO THIS TIME TOUCH SECOND BOTTLE

direction.raw_text: !!!...  I go out now...  SO FUCKIN HOT NOW, MAYBE TOO FUCKIN HOT NOW, FUCKA.  I toucha one bottle...  DO I GO TOUCH A SECOND BOTTLE?...  HUH? - I DO THIS TIME TOUCH SECOND BOTTLE -
direction.name: direction

result.heading: TOUCH MYSEF IN HOT FUCKIN PUSSY
NOW I GO ROUND AND ROUND YOU AHHHH
GO OUT AND TOUCH A NUMBER ONE BOTTLE

direction.raw_text: - TOUCH REGGIE WITH TONGUE - TOUCH MYSEF IN HOT FUCKIN PUSSY - GO OUT NOW...  NOW I GO ROUND AND ROUND YOU AHHHH - GO OUT AND TOUCH A NUMBER ONE BOTTLE - WAIT NOW!!! ...  REGGIE...  YOU SHOW NOW- Reggie reaches his hand around Johnnies face - tears off tape and gag - then opens his hand and shows Johnnie a cufflink with a particular design in turquoise, orange, and silver.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I forgot to show you this.  The gentlemen that gave this to me said youd recognize it.  Said he wanted itd be bout the last thing you ever saw in this life.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: this?...  OH GOD!!!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - DO I TOUCH A SECOND BOTTLE BFORE I TOUCH JOHNNIE - DO I?  DO I???......... (very quietly and breathy) No...  I touch Johnnie. As her finger touches Johnnies face there is a loud CLICK.  Johnnie moans and closes his eyes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: One ... two ... three ... four ... five ... GETTIN TOO FUCKIN HOT, REGGIE...  FEELIN MYSEF ... six ... seven ... eight... Johnnie starts to scream and violently try to move out of his chair.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Nine... (she moves out of the way)
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: (recognizing cufflink) Oh God...  OH GOD...  Santos... Oh God Marietta ... are you in on
dialogue.name: dialogue

result.heading: DO I TOUCH A SECOND BOTTLE BFORE I TOUCH JOHNNIE
JUANA I GO ROUND AND ROUND

direction.raw_text: ...  TEN!!! We see a hole in the front of the barrel - BOOM!!! The opposite wall and bottles get covered with blood.  Juana and Reggie race into each others arms and kiss right above Johnnies dead, bloodied head.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : 120. INT. THUNDERBIRD - TWO LANE TEXAS FARM ROAD - NIGHT Lula and Sailor are driving through the dark desert.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sure is a big deal round here... Alamo Road, Alamo Street, Alamo Square, Alamo Buildin, Alamo Alamo.  They aint forgettin about it in a hurry.  Thats the thing bout memory?  Some things you wish you could forget...  Whats troublin you, sugar?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You know, Lula, I never told you what all I was doin before I met you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I just figured you was out bein Mr. Cool...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Not exactly, sugar...  One reason were in all the trouble were in right now is cause of what I was doin...  I tried to tell you this before... LULA Youre scarin me, baby.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, theres a good side as well as a bad side to it...  The good side is I knew your daddy, and I thought Clyde was a good ol guy...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You knew my daddy?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes I did...  I sure did...  The bad side of it is I did some drivin for a man named Marcello Santos...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh shit...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I quit workin for im, but just before I did, I ended up one night at a house...  I dont know what it is they all think I saw that night, but I was just sittin out in the car till the whole place went up in flames.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: God, Sailor...  Thats the night my daddy died.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I know, sugar...  But while the place was burnin...  Before Santos came out - I pitched some rocks at the second floor windows case anyone was upstairs sleepin...  Afterwards... When I met you, I always liked to think I mighta saved your life.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thats some big secret you been carryin, Sailor.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We all got a secret side, baby.  Hope you dont think I been lyin to you bout other things, sugar.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Howd you know my daddy?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Met him through Santos...  Clyde - your daddy - had some sorta business deal with Santos. Lula stays quiet for a moment - listening to the heavy hum of the V-8.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Lula, you there?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah, Im here.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You upset with me?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, Sailor darlin.  Just shockin sometimes when things arent the way you thought they were...  I been carryin a secret too...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : 121. INT. FORTUNE HOUSE - LIVINGROOM/UPSTAIRS HALLWAY/BEDROOM - NIGHT The livingroom is on fire. The livingroom is on fire and we move upstairs - Lula races through the smoke-filled hallway to her mothers bedroom. The livingroom is on fire and Lula throws open the door to her mothers bedroom just in time to see Marcello Santos leaving through a window. Her mother laughs a wild, crazy laugh - exactly the same laugh Lula heard on the porch of the Cape Fear Hotel.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That night in the fire while my daddy was dyin...  I saw mama up in her room with Santos...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : 122. INT. THUNDERBIRD - TWO LANE TEXAS FARM ROAD - NIGHT LULA ...They was laughin arm in arm like animals.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I didnt want to say it ... but I had a feelin Santos was up to somethin with your mama...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My mama... (after a pause - she smiles) So Sailor, our histories have been somewhat intertwined.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They have, sugar.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I take that as a sign that we were destined by fate to be together.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Its a comfortin idea.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, were really out in the middle of it now, aint we?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Theres worse places, honey.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If you say so.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Trust me on it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I do trust you, Sailor.  Like I aint never trusted nobody before.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well be alright, peanut, long as weve got room to move.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (looking into the highway) Whats that?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I dont know...  Looks like clothes. Sailor starts to slow down.  The highway is suddenly littered with clothes strewn everywhere and two open suitcases smashed near the side of the road.  Sailor slows down to a crawl.  He and Lula turn to each other - theyve just seen TWO DEAD BODIES.  One close to the side of the highway - and other just off in the desert brush.  Off behind is an overturned car.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh God, Sailor.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: One bad car accident...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: !!! Coming out of the darkness is a YOUNG GIRL, her clothes half torn off - blood draining out of several deep wounds.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sailor, what are we gonna do?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I dont know, honey, but we gotta help that girl - get her to a town and hope no one catches on I broke parole. They get out of the car and the girl comes toward them screaming.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ive got about five hundred dollars in my wallet and I cant find it... My mothers going to kill me.  Its got all my cards in it...  It was in my pocket...  Now my pockets gone.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: !!!  NOW SHE TELLS ME. The girl starts walking back toward the car.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Lets get ahold a her quick.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You think shes gonna make it?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Dont know, but shes gonna bleed all over our car, Ill tell ya that... (to Girl) Hey...  Hello...  Girl...  You gotta come with us, honey. Sailor reaches out cautiously and takes hold of the girls arm.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: !!!  LEAVE ME ALONE...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: !!!...  Shit, I got this damn sticky stuff in my hair... She keeps digging her fingers into a bloody wound in her head.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Gotta find my wallet. (to Sailor) Dont you say one word of this to my mother.  God, shes gonna kill me. The girls falls to one knee and struggles to get back up.  Sailor and Lula each take an arm and try to help her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ?... Sailor and Lula help the girl stand, but her eyes start rolling back and a bunch of fresh blood comes gushing up out of her mouth.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I cant take this, Sailor.  Shes dyin right in front of our eyes...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Im afraid she is, baby. Sailor kneels down next to the girl and runs his hand gently across her forehead.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Get my lipstick... (whisper) Its in my purse. The girl dies.  Sailor and Lula hold real still for a moment.  Lula starts to cry.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She died right in front of me.  Whyd she have to go and do that, Sailor?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Lets get outta here, honey. Before getting up, Sailor lets his hand come off the girls forehead down over her eyes - closing them.  He puts his hand on her cheek then gets up.  He puts his arm around Lula and they go back to her car. Sailor helps Lula in on her side and closes the door for her.  He goes around, gets in and looks over at Lula, who breaks down crying harder. Sailor starts the car and takes off. FADE OUT: FADE IN: 123. INT. THUNDERBIRD - BIG TUNA - MORNING The Thunderbird drives past a large stucco fish on a rock stand which has a sign on it that says BIG TUNA, TEXAS.  Sailor cruises the T-Bird along the main street of Big Tuna, eye-balling the place.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, it aint exactly Emerald City...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Not quite as bad as the weather though... It must be a hundred and ten and it aint even noon yet. 123A. EXT. IGUANA MOTEL - MORNING Sailor pulls the car up in front of the Iguana Motel.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thisll do.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : 124. INT. IGUANA MOTEL - DAY The room is simple: double bed, dresser, mirror, chair, sink, toilet, bathtub (no shower), electric fan, window overlooking the street.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Not bad for eleven dollars a day.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No radio or TV... She strips off the spread, tosses it in a corner and sits down on the bed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And no AC.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Fan works.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Now what?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Lets get a sandwich and find out about some work.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sailor?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This aint exactly my most thrillin notion of startin a new life. They stare at each other.  Lula suddenly feels sick to her stomach and slumps down on the edge of the bed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Im gonna stay here in this room, Sailor.  I dont feel so good?  This heat makes me tired.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay, honey, Ill see you later.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : 125. EXT. REDS GARAGE - DAY A tall, skinny man, RED, in his early thirties with wild, uncombed hair the color of pomegranate, walks out of the garage.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You Red?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, I aint Blackie. Sailor holds out his right hand to shake.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Names Sailor Ripley.  Katy over at the drugstore thought you might have some work I could do. Red extends his oil-blackened right hand and shakes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Things aint real hot right now. Rex, there though, (nodding toward a half-naked man burrowed under an 83 Buick) is about to relocate in about a week to San Angelo.  I might could use a man when he does...  You good with engines?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I aint no Enzo Ferrari, but they used to call me Wrench when I was a kid.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well see how she goes then when Rex takes off.  Check back. Two men, SPARKY and BUDDY, both about forty, walk up to Red.  One of them wears a grey baseball cap with a Confederate flag on it and the other has an LBJ straw Stetson.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hows it look?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Reckon the heads cracked, like I thought.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Shit, thats what I was afraid of.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ill get you foreigners a beer.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Im Buddy, and this heres Sparky. Sailor introduces himself to Sparky and Buddy and Rex.  They all shake hands or nod and move out of the sun to drink their beers.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My girl and I are lookin for a place to settle.  Were bunked down at the Iguana Motel.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So are we.  Its the only motel in Big Tuna.  Have you met Bobby Just Like The Country Peru yet?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, we just got in a hour and a half ago.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You will.  Hes the Mr. Fix-It at the Iguana.  His truck broke down here a couple of months ago.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Escaped con.  Man got some serious prison tattoos.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Everbody got a past.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Just some got more future in em than others.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That aint no lie. Sailor finishes his beer, stands it on the ground and steps on it, crushing it flat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Been nice meetin yall.  Preciate the beer.  Ill be seein yall soon.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Very soon.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: One thing about bein in Big Tuna: you dont have much choice about who you see and who you dont.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : 126. EXT. IGUANA BANK - DAY The temperature on the tower reads One Hundred Twelve. CUT TO: 127. INT. IGUANA MOTEL - DAY In front of the door there is a large, damp spot on the rug where about a hundred and fifty flies are buzzing and landing.  Sailor sees this when he opens the door.  He steps across the large spot and finds Lula just waking up on the bed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That you, Sail, honey?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The only one. Lula opens her eyes and looks at him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You find any work?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Maybe.  Met a guy named Red, owns a garage, could have some work in about a week.  Met a few hard luck boys whos stayin here.  Whats that smell?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I barfed.  Tried to make it to the bathroom...  Turned out it was the wrong door anyways...  I sorta got it cleaned up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You sick?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A little, I think...  Darlin?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Come sit by me. Sailor goes over and sits on the bed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I dont know that this is the right place for us. Sailor strokes Lulas head.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It aint gonna be forever, peanut. Lula closes her eyes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I know, Sailor.  Nothin is.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : 128. EXT. SKY OVER BIG TUNA - EVENING The darkening evening sky is filled with flying monkeys. CUT TO: 129. INT. IGUANA MOTEL - COURTYARD - NIGHT Sailor, Lula, Sparky, and Buddy are sitting in the courtyard of the motel sharing Sparkys fifth of Ezra Brooks.  An electric bug killer is working overtime.  Buddy is reading from a newspaper.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Robert Brenton, twenty-five, was killed when his car went off the road on State Highway 118, according to the Department of Public Safety.  Brenton and two passengers, William Reese and Susan Day, were thrown from the automobile, reports said. Sailor looks at Lula.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Susan Day... The assistant manager, TOMMY THOMPSON, speaks from the shadows behind the group.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Robert Brenton, that dumb fuck.  That stupid shit...  That fuckin Bob was so fuckin dumb...  He deserved to die...  That asshole. They all look over at Tommy.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey, Tommy...  Whats goin on over there in number four where al them bright lights are all the time?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Them are makin a pornographic movie... Texas style...  Why?  You wanna join in?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How do you get sixteen Haitians into a Dixie Cup?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Tell em it floats.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sparkys big on Florida jokes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You need a active sense of humor to survive in the Big Tuna. BOBBY PERU walks in and comes over.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey, everybody.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sailor, Lula, this heres the man himself.  Bobby, this is Sailor and Lula, the most recent strandees, economic variety. Bobby nods to Lula and offers a hand to Sailor.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Bobby Peru, just like the country. Sparky and Buddy laugh.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Accordin to Red and Rex, Bobbys the most excitin item to hit Big Tuna since the 86 cyclone sheared the roof off the high school.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Only in town two months and there aint a young thing around dont know how that cobra tattoo works, right, Bob? Bobby laughs.  He has a lopsided grin that exposes only three brownish front teeth and he has flat black eyes that seem to reflect no light.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You from Texas, Mr. Peru? Bobby pulls up a chair and pours himself a shotglass full of whiskey.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Im from all over.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You was in the Marines, huh? Bobby looks down at his hand, flexs it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Four years.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Bobby was at Cao Ben.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Whats Cao Ben?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How old are you?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Twenty.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Lotta women and kids and old people died at Cao Ben.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: March, 1968.  We torched a village and the government made a big deal out of it. Bobby sips the whiskey and closes his eyes for several seconds before reopening them and looking at Buddy.  His eyes open slowly and they practically burn a hole in Buddy.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You was on a ship, pardner.  Hard to make contact with the people when youre off floatin in the Gulf of Tonkin.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey Bobby, have yourself another glass a Jack. Sparky refills Bobbys shotglass.  Bobby tosses it back in one gulp.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Dont mind if I fuckin do... Speakin a Jack...  One-eyed Jacks yearnin to go a peepin in a seafood store...  Good meetin you. Adios, boys. He walks out and after hes gone...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Somethin in that man scares me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No shit.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (pouring himself another shot) Bobbys got a way...  Cant shake that institution odor. Lula puts a hand on Sailors leg.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Darlin, I still aint feelin so well.  Im goin to bed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ill come along. They say goodnight to Sparky and Buddy and head for their room.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : 130. INT. IGUANA MOTEL - SAILOR AND LULAS ROOM - NIGHT SAILOR Man, that barf smell dont fade fast. Lula goes right to the bed and flops down on it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Anything I can do for you?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, I dont think so, Sail.  I just need to lie down. Lula listens to Sailor brush his teeth, urinate into the toilet and flush it.  Sailor comes out of the bathroom and climbs into bed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sailor?  You know what?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I know you aint particularly pleased bein here.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Not that.  Look at what I wrote down cause I cant say it. Lula hands Sailor a note which reads Im pregnant.  Sailor looks into her eyes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Its okay by me, peanut.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, nothin personal, but I aint sure its okay by me. Sailor crumples the note and puts it in the ashtray.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Really, Sailor, it aint nothin against you.  I love you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Love you, too.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I know.  Just Im sorta uncomfortable about the way some things is goin, and this dont help soothe me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I know this aint easy, Lula, but I aint gonna let things get no worse, I promise. CU of Lula setting fire to the pregnant note in the ashtray. DISSOLVE TO: 131. INT. IGUANA MOTEL - SAILOR AND LULAS ROOM - DAY CU of flies on vomit stain. There is a knock on the door which wakes Lula from her nap.  She opens the door.  Bobby Peru stands outside.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey, pretty woman...  Sailor here?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, hes out changin the oil in the car.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Man, I gotta take a piss bad...  Can I use your head there?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well...  Yeah - okay.
direction.name: direction

direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, yes, you can. Santos steps forward.  Lula begins to tremble.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Your mamas been real worried bout you, honey.  Me too...  Can you give your old friend Santos a hug, too? Santos arms begin to go around Lula.  Lula lets out a blood-curdling scream and shakes like a leaf on a tree.  Santos grabs her hard - in a bear hug.  On one shirt cuff we see a cufflink which is turquoise, orange, and silver.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : 150. INT. WALLS UNIT - DAY Sailor lays on his jail bed reading a letter from Lula.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : 151. INT. FORTUNE HOUSE - DAY Lula sits in her bedroom reading a letter from Sailor.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : 152. INT. MARIETTA FORTUNES HOUSE - EVENING/ 153. INT. LULA FORTUNES HOUSE - EVENING - (SIX YEARS LATER) Six years later...  Lula stands in the living room holding a glass of ice water while talking on the telephone to her mother.  Marietta is wearing a giant diamond ring on one hand and the other hand is holding a Martini and Rossi sweet vermouth.  Marietta is slumped over in an ottoman with wheels and is pushing her drunken self around the livingroom as she talks on the phone.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Im goin, mama.  No way I cant go.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You aint takin Pace, though.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Course I am, mama.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What times Sailors train get in?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Six.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Got any plans?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Figure well go have supper someplace. Maybe get some barbecue out by Stateline.  Sailor always liked that Havana Browns Pig Pickin.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, you be careful with that boy, Lula.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sailor aint a boy no more, mama.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Dont mean him.  Its Pace concerns me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Really, mama, I gotta go.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What if I asked you not to?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wouldnt make any difference.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What if I told you not to?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mama ... if you get in the way of me and Sailors happiness, Ill fuckin pull your arms out by the roots. Lula hangs up and throws her glass of water at a picture of her mother - draining it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : 154. INT. LULAS CAR - EVENING PACE ROSCOE FORTUNE is a shy, polite, innocent six-year old who wears a long-billed fishing cap and pants with suspenders.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Howll we know what he looks like? Lula makes a wide left turn onto Jeff Davis Highway without signaling, causing the driver of a white Bonneville headed across the intersection to jam on his brakes in order to avoid a collision.  The Bonneville driver sits on his horn and shouts at Lula.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mama, you almost crashed us. Lula steadies the steering wheel of her Camaro with her left elbow while she strikes a match and lights up a More.  She throws the match out the window and takes possession of the wheel with both hands, the cigarette is clamped in her teeth.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Dont give me no trouble now, Pace, please.  This aint the easiest day in a long time.  And what do you mean how are we gonna know what your daddy looks like?  You seen his photo.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Howll he know what we look like? He seen our photo? Lula puffs furiously several times on her More before she takes it out of her mouth and drops it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Damn it, child!  Now look what you made me do.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What I made you do, mama? Lula feels around on the floor with one hand until she finds the cigarette.  Sirens can be heard up ahead.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Nothin, honey. (stubbing it out in the ashtray) Mamas just actin strange.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You aint actin, mama.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why, Pace Roscoe Ripley, aint you got one cute mouth tonight? They pass an automobile accident where a man has been thrown into the curb - his head broken open and bleeding.  The ambulance is just arriving.  Lula looks away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : 155. ACCIDENT - EVENING A CRAZY MAN in a wheelchair is wheel up to the accident victim, who is bleeding profusely and in a state of shock.  The man in the wheelchair stares at him for a moment.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey man...  HEY...  Same fuckin thing happened to me last year...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : 156. INT. LULAS CAR - EVENING Pace looks up at his mother.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I still aint sure what my daddy looks like.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Like you, sweetheart.  You and your daddy got the same mouth, eyes, ears, and nose.  Only difference is your color hair is like mine.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My daddy aint never killed nobody, has he, mama?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Course he aint never killed nobody. Whyd you say that, Pace?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Heard grandpa Santos and grandmama talkin.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Grandmama said how Sailor murdered a man.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wrong, baby.  Your daddy never committed no murder.  Musta been you didnt hear grandmama proper.  He made some mistakes, is all.  Your daddy aint always been so lucky...  Were almost at the depot, honey.  Sit back a minute.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : 157. EXT. TRAIN STATION - EVENING Lula pulls the Camaro into in the station parking lot and kills the engine.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why we sittin here, mama?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thinkin a second, baby. Lula gets out and goes around for Pace.  They hold hands as they walk toward the station.  The big clock on the side of the building shows ten minutes past six.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Im scared, mama.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why, honey?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Case daddy dont like me.  What if he dont like that I dont got his color hair.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Pace, your daddyd love you even if you didnt have no hair at all. CUT TO:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . INT. TRAIN STATION - EVENING Lula sees Sailor as soon as she opens the door.  He is sitting in an orange plastic chair against the opposite wall, smoking a cigarette.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Still partial to Camels, huh? Sailor smiles.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: First pack of tailor-mades I had in a while. He stands up and looks down at Pace, who is still holding hands with Lula.  Sailor puts out his right hand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You must be my son.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Shake hands with your daddy. Pace releases Lulas hand and puts his own in Sailors.  Sailor grips it gently but firmly, pumps once, then lets go.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Pleasure to meet you, Pace.  I read a lot about you. Sailor looks at Lula.  Her eyes are full of tears and she lets them loose.  Sailor tries to smile.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You hungry?  Pace and I aint had dinner yet.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Lead the way. Sailor picks up his black metal suitcase and follows them to the car. CUT TO:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . INT. LULAS CAR - NIGHT Lula drives.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No rag top, huh? Lula starts to reply, then stops.  She stares straight ahead, gripping the wheel hard.  Suddenly, she pulls over to the side of the road, turns off the engine and gets out of the car.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Whats wrong, mama?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Dont worry, son.  Just stay here. Sailor gets out and goes over to Lula, who is leaning back against the hood.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Im sorry, Sailor.  I just cant help it.  Give me a minute and Ill quit.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Boys frightened, Lula.  This aint no good.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Really, Sail, Ill be okay.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Its a mistake, honey.  You two go on. Ill walk back to the depot.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Whatre you talkin about?  Thats your son in there.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He aint never known me, Lula, so there aint much for him to forget. Not seein each other for six years makes it next best to simple for us, too.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How can you say that, Sailor?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What makes sense, is all. Sailor goes around to the drivers side, reaches in and pulls the keys out of the ignition.  He unlocks the trunk, removes his suitcase, and closes the lid.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Dont do this, Sailor, please. Sailor slips the keys in her shirt pocket and leans his head into the car.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oiga, amigo.  If ever somethin dont feel right to you, remember what Pancho said to The Cisco Kid... Lets went, before we are dancing at the end of a rope, without music. Sailor stands up and looks at Lula.  Her eye makeup runs in dark streaks down her face. ECU of Lulas eyes.  Her eye makeup runs like black sweat over eyes and down her cheeks as in Sailors dream.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You been doin fine without me, peanut. There aint no need to make life toughern it has to be. He picks up his suitcase, kisses Lula lightly on the lips and walks away.  She lets him go.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : 160. EXT. CITY STREET - LATE AFTERNOON/EVENING Sailor walks down the street pretending hard not to care. CUT TO: 161. INT. LULAS CAR - LATE AFTERNOON/EVENING Lula climbs in behind the wheel - sobbing.  Pace sits sadly, staring out the window. CUT TO: 162. EXT. CITY STREET - LATE AFTERNOON/EVENING Sailor continues walking down the street.  A GANG OF INSANE KILLER TEENAGERS on PCP appear and come towards Sailor.  They circle around him, coming in closer for the kill.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What do you faggots want? Thats all it takes.  The gang is on him.  Sailor tries to defend himself, but one big punch to his nose sends him down and out.  Blood begins to pour from his swelling nose. 162A. EXT. CITY STREET - LATE AFTERNOON/EVENING CU OF SAILORS FACE - a bright light illuminates it. In the sky above Sailor, a large glowing bubble holding the beautiful Good Witch of the North comes floating down above him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sailor Ripley... Sailors eyes suddenly see the Good Witch through his closed eyelids. His mouth speaks through closed lips.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Good Witch...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sailor...  Lula loves you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But Im a robber and a manslaughterer and I havent had any parental guidance.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Shes forgiven you of all these things ...  You love her...  Dont be afraid, Sailor.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But Im wild at heart.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If you are truly wild at heart, youll fight for your dreams...  Dont turn away from love, Sailor...  Dont turn away from love...  Dont turn away from love. The Good Witch disappears. 162. EXT. CITY STREET - LATE AFTERNOON/EVENING Sailor opens his eyes and drags himself and his giant swollen nose up on his feet.  The gang still stands around him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You had enough, asshole?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes, I have...  And I wanna apologize to you gentlemen for referring to you as homosexuals.  I also want to thank you fellas, youve taught me a valuable lesson in life. (lifts his head high)
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: (noticing a USMC tattoo on Bobbys right hand)
dialogue.name: dialogue

result.heading: ILL TEAR YOUR FUCKIN HEART OUT, GIRL

dialogue.raw_text: (smiles - puts a hand on Sailors shoulder)
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (looking at Bobbys hand on his shoulder)
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (voice-over) Dearest Sailor Darling, The first thing youll want to know is Im keeping the baby. Mama wasnt for it in the beginning but I think shes looking forward to it.  Im gonna name it Pace no matter if its a boy or a girl.  Pace Ripley sounds good, dont it?  Its kind of hard to believe that Pace will be six years old when you get out. I feel like Im kind of in prison too, but I know in six months, itll be over and Ill have a son or daughter to show for it.  Our child!! I love you Sailor.  I dont know how much or what it means though I miss you an awful bunch sometimes I know youre thinking about me cause I can feel it.  I miss you not being around to call me peanut nobody else ever called me that. Mama married Santos.  It just about drove me crazy.  My daddy left a lot of money somehow and theyre spending it like there is no tomorrow.  Im going to move out as soon as I can. Mama and Santos said because of the baby theyre lookin at the two of us in a different light - whatever that means. Johnnie Farragut has plumb disappeared.  No one knows where.  I miss him, but not near as much as I miss you. Time dont really fly honey does it? Love, your Lula P.S. I miss dancing...
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (voice-over) Dear Lula, It is fine with me about the baby as you already know. And Pace being your family name and all is just right. What about a middle name if it is a boy after my granddaddy Roscoe?  He would be proud I know though he is long passed.  Pace Roscoe Ripley does not sound so bad do you think? This place is not so pretty as Pee Dee.  Not pretty at all.  There are boys inside these walls meaner than Peru you can bet.  There is a Death House.  I am getting along.  The only thing is not thinking about the future. I miss dancing with you, too.  I love you.  It is hard to end this letter.  If I stop writing youre gone.  There is not a lot more to say though. Vava con dios mi amor. Sailor LONG FADE OUT:
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (turning to Pace and patting his head)
dialogue.name: dialogue

result.heading: EXT.
location: LATE AFTERNOON/EVENING CU OF SAILORS FACE

direction.raw_text: !!!! Sailor turns around and starts running back.  The gang watches him go.
direction.name: direction
